name: Facebook FullScreen Mod
description:
A (more or less^^) responsive full screen mod for FB NewsFeed, groups and lists. Does not affect timeline pages.

Works with the redesign NewsFeed (March 2014) and the old version.


I suggest to increase the free space on the sides if you use a really big widescreen.
additional_info: Beta release, work in progress. Feedback is appreciated. Visit me on Facebook. ChangeLog: Mar 29, 2014 Updated to remove the white background behind shared link images. Mar 27, 2014 Updated to fix an issue with the left nav icons.

discussions.name: Working fine until recently. Was great while it lasted.
